UPDATE YE161050 SET NP_HTHR_MCUR_WKAR_INFEE_AMT = #npHthrMcurWkarInfeeAmt# , NP_HTHR_AREA_INFEE_AMT = #npHthrAreaInfeeAmt# , ISMT = #ismt# , REVN_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR = #revnAddr#
WHERE DPOB_CD =#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR =#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD =#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY =#systemkey#

sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE161050 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , NP_HTHR_WA_INFEE_AMT=#npHthrWaInfeeAmt# , NP_HTHR_WA_INFEE_DDC_AMT=#npHthrWaInfeeDdcAmt# , NP_HTHR_MCUR_WKAR_INFEE_AMT=#npHthrMcurWkarInfeeAmt# , NP_HTHR_MCUR_WKAR_DDC_AMT=#npHthrMcurWkarDdcAmt# , HTHR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_AMT=#hthrPblcPnsnInfeeAmt# , HTHR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT=#hthrPblcPnsnInfeeDdcAmt# , MCUR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_AMT=#mcurPblcPnsnInfeeAmt# , MCUR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT=#mcurPblcPnsnInfeeDdcAmt# , PNSN_INFEE_USE_AMT_SUM=#pnsnInfeeUseAmtSum# , PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT_SUM=#pnsnInfeeDdcAmtSum# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , NP_HTHR_WA_INFEE_AMT , NP_HTHR_WA_INFEE_DDC_AMT , NP_HTHR_MCUR_WKAR_INFEE_AMT , NP_HTHR_MCUR_WKAR_DDC_AMT , HTHR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_AMT , HTHR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT , MCUR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_AMT , MCUR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT , PNSN_INFEE_USE_AMT_SUM , PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE161050 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , NP_HTHR_WA_INFEE_AMT , NP_HTHR_WA_INFEE_DDC_AMT , NP_HTHR_MCUR_WKAR_INFEE_AMT , NP_HTHR_MCUR_WKAR_DDC_AMT , HTHR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_AMT , HTHR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT , MCUR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_AMT , MCUR_PBLC_PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT , PNSN_INFEE_USE_AMT_SUM , PNSN_INFEE_DDC_AMT_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE161050 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE161050 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
